citation.article-title: Characterization of N2O-producing Xanthomonas-like isolates from biofilters as Stenotrophomonas nitritireducens sp. nov., Luteimonas mephitis gen. nov., sp. nov. and Pseudoxanthomonas broegbernensis gen. nov., sp. nov.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Pseudoxanthomonas (Pseu.do.xan.tho.mo'nas. Gr. pseudes false ; M.L. n. Xanthomonas a bacterial generic name; M.L. fem. n. Pseudoxanthomonas false Xanthomonas)
The quinone type is Q-8, fatty acids are of the iso/anteiso-type with 15:0 iso and 15:0 anteiso predominating.
The strains have a yellow colour on trypticase soy agar and nutrient agar.
The type species is Pseudoxanthomonas broegbernensis.
